p: For the assessment of ortho-diphenols content, 40 μL of sodium molybdate solution (5%, w/v) prepared with hydro-methanol (50%, v/v) was added to 160 μL of diluted extract. The mixture was stood for 15 min at RT, protected from light, before the absorbance at 375 nm was read. The content was quantified using gallic acid as standard. Results were defined in mg GAE g −1 DW.
